text: Moslem Mesigar (born 17 September 1984) is an Iranian beach soccer player. He plays in Forward position.Moslem Mesigar at fifa.com ==Honours== ===Beach soccer=== * Iran **FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup Third place: 2017 **Beach Soccer Intercontinental Cup winner: 2013 **Asian Championship winner : 2013,2017 Third place: 2011, 2008 **Asian Beach Games winner: 2012, Third place: 2010 ====Individual==== **Top Scorer: 2013 AFC Beach Soccer Championship == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian beach soccer players
title: Moslem Mesigar
